page.name: Fearlessly Girl Club
page.description: Fearlessly Girl is designed to give all girls, and those identifying as such a safe place to come together and target the unique challenges girls face in our modern world.  This club will give girls the tools and confidence they need to help create a kinder and more supportive girl-to-girl environment.
page.advisorName: Katie Lenart (soon to be Katie Bradley 4/23/22)
page.advisorEmail: lenartk@masonohioschools.com (email will change for 22-23 school year)
